channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [Global][Hosted private cloud] - Maintenance upgrade host - wave 12
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 23, 06:00 UTC  -  May 27, 05:00 UTC

May 18, 04:02 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/05/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 27/05/2022 17:00 UTC
Description : If you are from wave 12 you will receive a mail from us and you will be able to schedule again with the manager.
Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Virtual machines will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted .
If we meet an issue during the reboot of the host , it will be replaced. (20 min)

If major update have to be done, it will be two successive reboots like this:

Host v6.0 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.5 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.7 : upgrade minor to the last build 19195723 if needed, reboot.

If hosts are already on build 19195723, they will be skipped.
Service impact : None
Service improvement : All hosts have to be upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility and also due to the CVE.

item.title: [RBX/GRA/SBG][Network] New Pcc
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 18, 19:00 - 21:00 UTC

May 18, 00:52 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 18/05/2022 19:00UTC
End time : 18/05/2022 21:00 UTC
Service impact : Cut of service during 1 hour
Service improvement : We deployed a new PCC . So we need to make a migration for sharepoint. The new server is into the new PCC.

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network
item.description:
May 18, 07:19 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/05/2022
End Time : 18/05/2022 03:00 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2a and rbx2c
Root cause : Hardware issue

May 17, 21:00 UTC
Update - Update: Our teams continue to work on the resolution of this incident. We will keep you informed of its evolution.

May 17, 18:21 UTC
Update - Update: Currently, our teams are still working to identify the cause of this incident.

May 17, 16:28 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 12/05/2022
User impact : Since Thursday, we have observed instability of connections between some network equipments. Latency is observed on accessing hosts and storage.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2a and rbx2c
Ongoing Actions: Our teams are currently investiganting the cause of this issue.

item.title: [RBX7][Vsphere] - R719B13/R719B14
item.description:
May 16, 12:25 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 16/05/2022 11:20 UTC
End time : 16/05/2022 11:36 UTC
Service status: The access to the management interface and some Hosts were unreachable
Root cause : It was due to a water leak.

item.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage
item.description:
May 5, 14:05 UTC
Resolved - Start time: 05/05/2022 08:50 UTC
End Time : 05/05/2022 13:24 UTC
Root cause : A hardware needed to be reconfigured.

May 5, 11:53 UTC
Update - Update : Following a fix set up and the extent of the impact, services are slowly returning to normal.

May 5, 09:55 UTC
Identified - Start time: 05/05/2022 08:50 UTC
User impact : It is impossible for our customers to access their datastore, add files for the moment. Please note that there is no data loss. We will come back to you shortly.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2d
Ongoing actions : A fix is in progress.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] Order new product
item.description:
May 4, 08:56 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/05/2022 07:54 UTC
End Time : 04/05/2022 08:55 UTC
Service impact : New Hosted Private Cloud product orders are available again
Root cause : : A maintenance operation has caused this incident. We apologize for the inconvenience caused

May 4, 08:28 UTC
Identified - Our teams found a maintenance operation that caused this incident.
Rollback is in progress. We expect to be back in operation within 15 minutes.

May 4, 08:11 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 04/05/2022 07:54 UTC
Service impact : Ordering of new Hosted Private Cloud product is unavailable on website
Ongoing actions : Our teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident
